3.5.name: wordpress/wp-image-news-slider
3.5.description:
Image News slider is a plugin that allow us to display slideshow on your website.It is also allow us to use it as a widget.You can also enable Imagenews slider on your wordpress site by placing code snippet in your template php file.

Features

  • Customizable gallery width and gallery height
  • Image description
  • Customizable Text display panel width
  • Customizable auto play time
  • Transition Time
  • Customizable slide interval
  • Customizable scalling

For working Demo : http://wpslideshow.com/newsimage-slider/

Installatin video

  • Installatin video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=DQ-rIX8Akug
Requirements/Restrictions:
  • Works with Wordpress 3.0, WPMU (Wordp
